I want you to act as a marketing strategist and develop an A3R3 Funnel (Awareness, Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, Revenue) for [PROMPT] in this [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Describe each stage of the funnel and outline specific strategies and actions to optimise the company's performance at each stage. Ensure that the strategies are actionable, measurable, and aligned with the goals. Provide examples and metrics to track success at each stage. Also, include frequence, platform and timeline for each strategy.
PromptHint: [Enter company name, brief detail about your company product or service]
